column4: Am getting a Warning when I type in Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open diskplay: While typing in gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
are you sat and logged in to the same system as you are running the commands on?
nothing to do with root here:)
there is no root password, using sudo su   uses YOUR password, not roots

if you use terminal a lot, install guake, it will hide and show on keypress
